# Family Dinner App - Copilot Instructions

This is a Next.js web application for managing weekly family dinners with iPhone-optimized interface.

## Project Overview
- **App Type**: Next.js web application optimized for iPhone
- **Users**: 3 family members (husband, wife, daughter)
- **Core Features**: Voting system, meal scoring, shopping lists, inventory management

## Key Components
- Weekly dinner voting interface
- Post-meal rating system
- Auto-generated shopping lists
- Wishlist for meal suggestions
- Produce inventory tracking

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for responsive styling
- Local Storage for data persistence
- Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities

## Development Guidelines
- Prioritize mobile-first design for iPhone optimization
- Use modern React hooks and patterns
- Implement clean, modular component architecture
- Focus on user-friendly interfaces for family members
